text: Egh an namakam an dagɨaba pura da inigh, egh ua da ikarvaghsɨ, an dagɨar an anɨngizim gisɨn ababanim inighan kogham. Egh an arazir kurabar amuan aghuagham. A bizir kɨ damuasa ia mɨkemeziba ko arazir kɨ ifongeziba baragh deravɨra dar gɨn mangɨ dar amuam. Otarir kam, uan afeziamɨn arazir kurabar osɨmtɨziba inigh, da bangɨn aremeghan kogham. Puvatɨgham. An angamɨra ikiam.
